message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be fair to propose a price of $14000 for this valuable item.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am interested in purchasing the product, but I can only afford to pay up to $13500.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I am willing to consider your offer, but I need to adjust the price slightly. My counteroffer is $13800 for the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. Considering my budget, I am willing to pay up to $13600 for the product.
I see, Bob. Let me think about it for a moment. I am prepared to accept $13700 for the product, considering the value it holds for you.
